近隣諸国: (きんりんしょこく) - neighboring countries; neighbouring countries; surrounding countries
返し: (kaeshi) - reversão, retorno; presente de devolução, favor de retorno; reversão, retorno; presente de devolução, favor de retorno; farpa (em um anzol); mistura de molho de soja, açúcar e mirin
返し技: (かえしわざ) - counterattack (kendo, judo, etc.); reversal technique
返す: (かえす) - (esp. 返す)  to return (something)/to restore/to put back; to turn over/to turn upside down/to overturn; (esp. 返す) to pay back/to retaliate/to reciprocate; (after the -masu stem of a verb) to repeat .../to do ... back
返す返す: (かえすがえす) - repeatedly; to a tremendous extent
返り: (かえり) - turning over/flipping over; reply/response; marks indicating the Japanese meaning of the texts of Chinese classics; lapel
返り三役: (かえりさんやく) - {sumo} former san'yaku-ranked wrestler returning to that rank
返り事: (かえりこと) - message that a messenger brings back home; reply/ode in reply; return gift
返り咲き: (かえりざき) - comeback (e.g. in business)/reinstatement; second blooming (in a season)/reflowering/reflorescence
返り咲く: (かえりざく) - to come back; to bloom a second time
返り大関: (かえりおおぜき) - {sumo} former ozeki-ranked wrestler returning to that rank
返り忠: (かえりちゅう) - act of betrayal
返り点: (かえりてん) - marks indicating the Japanese meaning of the texts of Chinese classics
返り花: (かえりばな) - second blooming (in a season)/reflowering/reflorescence; return to working by a prostitute, kabuki actor, etc.
返り血: (かえりち) - spurt of blood (from one's victim)
返り言: (かえりこと) - message that a messenger brings back home; reply/ode in reply; return gift
返り討ち: (かえりうち) - killing a would-be avenger; having the tables turned on someone (e.g. by a challenger)/being beaten at one's own game
返る: (かえる) - (esp. 返る) to return/to come back/to go back; to turn over; (esp. 返る) (after the -masu stem of a verb) (to become) extremely/(to become) completely
返上: (へんじょう) - give up; relinquish; serve up; let loose
返事を延ばす: (へんじをのばす) - to delay one's answer
返事を遅らす: (へんじをおくらす) - to defer one's reply

返信料葉書: (へんしんりょうはがき) - return, postage-paid postcard

返信用封筒: (へんしんようふうとう) - self-addressed stamped envelope; SASE
返信用葉書: (へんしんようはがき) - (postal) reply card; international reply coupon
返信要求表示: (へんしんようきゅうひょうじ) - reply request indication
返信ＩＰメッセージ表示: (へんしんアイピーメッセージひょうじ) - replying IP-message indication
返値: (かえりち) - return value (from a function, in programming)
返却口: (へんきゃくぐち) - return slot (for coins in a vending machine); drop-off point (for dirty dishes at a restaurant)
返咲き: (かえりざき) - comeback (e.g. in business)/reinstatement; second blooming (in a season)/reflowering/reflorescence
返品: (へんぴん) - returned goods; returning purchased goods
返戻金: (へんれいきん) - terminal bonus/lump sum when policy matures; payout on cancellation of contract
返本: (へんぽん) - books returned unsold; books returned to the library
返杯: (へんぱい) - offering a cup (of sake) in return
返済: (へんさい) - repayment; reimbursement; refund; redemption
返球: (へんきゅう) - return toss (e.g. from a catcher to a pitcher)
返盃: (へんぱい) - offering a cup (of sake) in return
返礼: (へんれい) - returning a present; returning a favor/returning a favour; returning a call; compensation
返答に窮する: (へんとうにきゅうする) - to be embarrassed for a reply; to be at a loss for a reply
返答に詰まる: (へんとうにつまる) - to be embarrassed for a reply
返答次第: (へんとうしだい) - (yoji) depending on the answer; hinging on the reply
返納: (へんのう) - returning (to the authorities); restoring
返読点: (へんどくてん) - word-order marks used to assist reading of Chinese classics
返送: (へんそう) - sending back; return to sender
返送内容エントリ: (へんそうないようエントリ) - returned-content entry
返送照合: (へんそうしょうごう) - echo check
返還義務: (へんかんぎむ) - obligation of restitution
返金口: (へんきんぐち) - coin return slot; change slot
返閉: (へんばい) - ceremony performed by a sorcerer to protect a noble setting out on a trip; dance steps inspired by this ceremony
迚も: (とっても) - (とっても is more emphatic) very/awfully/exceedingly; (before a negative form) (not) at all/by no means/simply (cannot)
迚もじゃないが: (とてもじゃないが) - (before a negative form) simply (cannot); definitely (cannot); absolutely (cannot); by no means
迚も斯くても: (とてもかくても) - no matter what; anyhow; in any case; at any rate; in any event; anyway
迚も迚も: (とてもとても) - (before a negative form) simply (cannot)

迦葉仏: (かしょうぶつ) - Kassapa Buddha; Kasyapa Buddha; Kashyapa Buddha

迦陵頻迦: (かりょうびんが) - kalavinka (san:); imaginary bird in paradise that sings sweet notes

迫り出す: (せりだす) - to push (a thing) out/to jut out (can have a negative nuance)/to protrude; to rise out the trap door (on stage)
迫り来る: (せまりくる) - to be imminent; to loom; to be approaching; to be impending

迫出す: (せりだす) - to push (a thing) out/to jut out (can have a negative nuance)/to protrude; to rise out the trap door (on stage)
